titleStmt.title: The history of the Babylonish cabal, or, The intrigues, progression, opposition, defeat, and destruction of the Daniel-Catchers in a poem / by Richard Steere.
titleStmt.author: Steere, Richard, 1643-1721.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The history of the sham-plot, defeat, and destruction of the Daniel-catchers.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
